a.title: Ohio Seal of Biliteracy

img.style: display: center; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Ohio Seal of Biliteracy

p.em: A Seal of Biliteracy recognizes graduating seniors who can demonstrate high levels of proficiency in English and at least one other language. A school or district gives this award by following state-established guidelines.

h3.strong: Cancelled Events through 5/1/2020 // BCSD Master Calendar

a.title: Go to comments for Cancelled Events through 5/1/2020 // BCSD Master Calendar
Go to comments for Advanced Placement Exams Update

span.p: The Bedford City School District Preschool Program applications will be available at the Glendale Preschool Fair on April 23, 2020, as well as online through the Bedford City Schools website, at the Board of Education, and at Glendale Primary School on April 24, 2020. Applications will be accepted through June 12, 2020, to be considered for the lottery to determine acceptance into the program. Applications received after this date will be placed on a waiting list.
Families of preschoolers who have been accepted into the program will be notified via phone call in June. Instructions for registration will be given at this time.

a.title: Go to comments for BCSD Preschool Program

span.p: The Bedford Board of Education has approved two important date changes to the 2019-2020 school calendar:
1. NO SCHOOL ON October 14 for a staff professional development day.

2. The staff professional development day scheduled for March 3 has been changed to March 17, due to an Ohio Primary Election Day change. There WILL be school on March 3 now and there WILL NOT be school on March 17.

a.title: Go to comments for Important District Calendar Date Changes

p.strong: Full/Part Day Peer Model Preschool Classes: Max Capacity

span.p: Unfortunately at this time all of our full/part day peer model preschool classes are at full capacity and we are not taking applications. If your preschool child has special needs, please contact Diane Schentur at 440-786-3518.
We will be accepting applications for the 2020-2021 school year beginning in April 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for Full/Part Day Peer Model Preschool Classes
Go to comments for 2019-2020 School Year Important Dates

h2.span: You can make a real impact on students and teachers when you volunteer with TEALS.

span.p: Join engineers from hundreds of companies and volunteer to help teach computer science!Volunteers help high schools build and grow sustainable, high quality, and rigorous computer science programs. We are looking for local business peoplewho are interested in helping in our computer science classes at Bedford High School. For more information:BCSD-TEALS

div.span: The Bedford City School District is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of gender, race, color, age, religion, disability, or national origin in the education programs and activities which it operates. Any questions or claims may be directed to the district's Title IX/Section 504 coordinator, Kenneth Elder, at 475 Northfield Road, Bedford, OH 44146.
